  • Method Details

    • insertOnTop

      public boolean insertOnTop​(DevelopmentCard newDevelopmentCard)
      When the stack is empty it checks if newDevelopmentCard's level is '1' when this is the case it simply sets the new card status to "ON_TOP" and adds the new card in the stack. If the stack already has elements in it and if level+1 of the element on top == new card level the method sets the first element of the stack to "ACTIVE" and then adds the new one
      Specified by:
      insertOnTop in interface ProductionSlot
      Parameters:
      newDevelopmentCard - a new DevelopmentCard to add to the queue in Deck
      Returns:
      true if everything goes right, false if you can't add the newDevelopmentCard for some reasons
